School Notes

Mission Statement of Sacred Heart Catholic SchoolSacred Heart Catholic School is committed to educating the heart, mind, and soul of its students and faculty. We will provide academic excellence with guidance from the Holy Spirit as we strive to create a Christ-filled environment. We will serve God in our community, our country, and our world.Our PhilosophySacred Heart Catholic School is an educational community where parents, students, faculty, and clergy seek to grow in understanding, appreciating, and living the Gospel message. We believe our school environment promotes spiritual, academic, social, personal, and physical growth. We encourage respect for self and others as we seek to build a climate of justice and equality.OurHistorySacred Heart Catholic School was reopened in the fall of 1995 after being closed in 1968. The school was reopened with Preschool and Kindergarten, and added a grade each year. As of the 2020-2021 school year, Sacred Heart Catholic School offers 3 year old preschool through 6thgrade. New construction of the building began in December 1998, adding two preschool rooms, a library/media center, offices, four classrooms, restrooms, and storage. Sacred Heart Catholic School was chosen in 2009 as the first Catholic School in Oklahoma to participate in the Oklahoma A+ Schools program. We are fully Accredited by the Oklahoma Conference of Catholic Schools Accrediting Association until 2024.

Frequently Asked Questions

How much does Sacred Heart Catholic School cost?

Sacred Heart Catholic School's tuition is approximately $7,100 for private students.

What schools are Sacred Heart Catholic School often compared to?

Sacred Heart Catholic Schoolis often viewed alongside schools like St. John Nepomuk Catholic School by visitors of our site.

What is the acceptance rate of Sacred Heart Catholic School?

The acceptance rate of Sacred Heart Catholic School is 99%, which is higher than the national average of 89%.

What sports does Sacred Heart Catholic School offer?

Sacred Heart Catholic School offers 2 interscholastic sports: Archery and Basketball.

When is the application deadline for Sacred Heart Catholic School?

The application deadline for Sacred Heart Catholic School is Dec. 1 / rolling (applications are due on Dec. 1 but additional applications are reviewed year-round as space permits ).
